additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Anionic, Nonionic and Amphoteric surfactants (Surfactants are readily biodegradable according to Australian Standard AS4351), Urea, Fragrance, Salt, Citric Acid (Plant derived ingredients), Preservatives and Colours. Visit our website for a full ingredients list.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Keep out of reach of children. If eye contact occurs, flush immediately with water for 15 minutes and seek medical advice. If swallowed, drink 1-2 glasses of water to dilute and seek medical advice. Close nozzle when not in use.

description: Earth Choice Concentrate Red Apple Dishwashing Liquid
name: Concentrate Red Apple Dishwashing Liquid
